Making Good Men Better

Gamma Beta National Fraternity is an Asian-interest brotherhood spanning six college campuses across Texas and Oklahoma.

A Brotherhood Spanning 6 Campuses

Our fraternity has six locations across Texas and Oklahoma. We are committed to expanding our reach to other universities and welcoming new members into our brotherhood.

  • Alpha Chapter

    UT – Austin

  • Beta Chapter

    Texas Tech University

  • Gamma Chapter

    Texas A&M University

  • Delta Chapter

    University of Oklahoma

  • Epsilon Chapter

    UT – San Antonio

  • Zeta Chapter

    University of Houston

What is Gamma Beta?

Gamma Beta Fraternity was founded in 2000 at UT-Austin. Our nine founders sought to create an unparalleled brotherhood guided by the best of our morals, ideals, and culture.
